subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James finished with 14 points, 12 assists and 10 rebounds as the Cavaliers quickly shook off a disappointing loss at Boston by beating the Miami Heat, 99-89.
snippet: LeBron James finished with 14 points, 12 assists and 10 rebounds as the Cavaliers quickly shook off a disappointing loss at Boston by beating the Miami Heat, 99-89.
